titles.title: RS635 Put peace into each other's hands

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Put peace into each other's hands
and like a treasure hold it,
protect it like a candle-flame,
with tenderness enfold it.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Put peace into each other's hands
with loving expectation;
be gentle in your words and ways,
in touch with God's creation.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Put peace into each other's hands
like bread we break for sharing
look people warmly in the eye:
our life is meant for caring.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
As at communion, shape your hands
into a waiting cradle;
the gift of Christ receive, revere,
united round the table.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Put Christ into each other's hands
he is love's deepest measure
in love make peace, give peace a chance,
and share it like a treasure.
